Get this book at your local book store or at Amazon, Pearson, or Informit.

Component-based Rails Applications is part of the Addison-Wesley Professional Ruby Series which, among others, includes books such as The Rails 5 Way by Obie Fernandez, Practical Object-Oriented Design by Sandi Metz, or Ruby on Rails Tutorial: Learn Web Development with Rails by Michael Hartl.
